creator: annichilez@hotmail.com
text:
Can not load any of the .dsp and .dsw file by the Visual Studio.net.
It said the project have error and can not convert and can not load.

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
Please provide the EXACT errors that occur when you attempt to convert
aprtest.dsp/dsw.  That is a rather 'interesting' project, it generates
a makefile on the fly based on some Win32-specific substitutions to
the generic Unix makefile.  Since it's a makefile based project, it might
refuse to convert if the makefile it's supposed to invoke isn't generated
prior to attempting to convert the project.

Now you can [from cvs HEAD as of yesterday.]  But you will need awk in the
  IDE's executables path (see httpd.apache.org/docs-2.0/platform/win_compiling.html
  for some pertinant notes about awk.exe).
creator: wrowe@apache.org
